content: **knitted socks in drops karisma the piece is worked from the toe upwards with a multicoloured pattern with cats and wedge heel sizes 35-43 theme halloween ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern u-957 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 22-24-27 cm leg-height approx 12 cm **yarn** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 05 black 50-50-50 g colour 07 bright blue and use a left-over of colour yellow for eyes **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch/pattern a 1 = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
